All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdvancingOrder
Represents the advancing order and its operational logic within the game.
AdvancingOrderTest
Test cases for Advancing Order
AirliftingOrder
This class gives the order to execute Airlifting Order, from one country to another.
AirliftingOrderTest
This class tests the Airlifting Order
AllTestSuite
Run all test cases
AttackLogic
An interface with the Attack logic
BombingOrder
Manages the logic for the bombing order in the game.
BombingOrderTest
Test class for Bombing Order
Cards
A class that creates card and assigns them randomly
CardsType
An enum containing all the card types
Continent
Class that provides every method that is required for any properties of Continent
ContinentTest
This class tests the functionalities for Continent class
Country
Class that provides every method that is required for any properties of Country
CountryTest
This class tests the functionalities for Country class
DefaultAttackLogic
An class which implements the AttackLogic class
DeployOrder
Class DeployOrder which is a child of Order, used to execute the orders /** A class with the information of Order details
DeployOrderTest
Test class for Deploy Order
ExecuteOrder
Class that has the main logic behind the functioning of Execute order phase in the game
ExecuteOrderTest
Test class that tests Execute order phase implementations
GameCalculation
An class that contains the Game calculations
GameEngine
A class that starts the game with the first phase
GameEngineController
A class that manages the flow of different phases of the warzone game
GameEngineTest
Test case class to check the correct starting phase of game
GameMap
Class that provides every method that is required for any properties of the Game Map
GameMapTest
A class to test the functionalities of GameMap Class
GamePhase
Enum containing the different phases of the Game.
GamePhaseTest
Test case class to test the right possible next phase from each phase
GamePlayBegins
Class that has the main logic behind the functioning of GameplayBegins phase in the game
InvalidCommandException
This class represents an exception for handling invalid console commands.
InvalidInputException
This class represents an exception for handling invalid console commands.
IssueOrderTest
Test class that tests Issue order phase implementations
LogEntryBuffer
This class records all actions within the game as observable events.
LogEntryWriter
Observes LogEntryBuffer and records the actions to a log file.
MapEditor
Class that has the main logic behind the functioning of Map Editor phase in the game
MapViewer
A class which provides the logic for reading the pre-existing maps in the file
NegotiatingOrder
This class extends Order to provide functionality for executing a negotiate order.
NegotiatingOrderTest
Test class for Negotiating Order
Observable
An interface for implementation of Observable with a notifyObservers function.
Observer
An interface for implementation of Observer with an update function
Order
An abstract class to manage the orders of the players
OrderCreator
A class to create Orders in the game.
OrderDetails
A class with the information of Order details
OrderForBlockade
Represents an order to execute a blockade, which triples the number of armies in a country and makes it neutral.
OrderIssue
Class which is the controller for the Issue Order phase
OrderOfBlockadeTest
This class tests the Blockade Order
Player
Class that provides every method that is required for any properties of a Player in the game
PlayerTest
Test Class that showcases the testcases for Model Class Player
Reinforcements
Class that has the main logic behind the functioning of Reinforcements phase in the game
ReinforcementTest
This class tests the functionalities for Reinforcement phase
SaveMap
A class which provides the logic for saving the map
ValidateMap
A class which provides the logic for validating the game map
ValidateMapTest
A class to test all the functionalities in Map Validation
